channel.title: Tame Summon Special Missions
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Tame Summon Special Missions" - Nevermind.... I found the problem

item.title: Tame Summon Special Missions
item.content:encoded:
I have enough friend points and yet the mission won't come upâ€¦. Is there something I'm missing?

EDIT:Yes, there is something I'm missing. My village(s) don't have a Summoning Circle

I think there should be a sidenote about how you need a Summoning Circle on the page, because there's no mention of it and some people don't look through the Village Upgrades.
